page_body.h1: Images of Virtuality: Conceptualizations and Applications in Everyday Life
page_body.p: April 24, 2009 - Athens University of Economics and Business, Greece
An International Workshop of IFIP WG9.5 on "Virtuality and Society"

Following on last year's International Working Conference of IFIP 9.5 Working Group on Virtuality and Society: "Massive Virtual Communities" at Luneburg, this workshop will focus on conceptualizations and applications of virtuality in everyday life, including socialization, governance, education, entrepreneurship and entertainment.
Visit the workshop's web site to get more information" http://www.imagesofvirtuality.org.
